title: The Hollywood Reporter Tastes and Debates the Tom Cruise Christmas Cake
summary: Four THR staffers sit down for a slice of Doan’s White Chocolate Coconut Bundt Cake, famously gifted by the actor each December. Opinions (and surging glucose levels) followed.

title: New Musical ‘Three Months Later’ to Hold L.A. Presentation Starring Kristen Bell
summary: The production will hold three public performances at the Jim Henson Studios in February.
